LanguageData.EggFRaptorUnfertilized.label: Raptor Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggFRaptorUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Raptor.
LanguageData.EggFRaptorFertilized.label: Raptor Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggFRaptorFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Raptor. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Baby Raptor. Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggFenixUnfertilized.label: Fenix Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggFenixUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Fenix.
LanguageData.EggFenixFertilized.label: Fenix Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggFenixFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Fenix. If Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggGreenWyvernUnfertilized.label: Green wyvern Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggGreenWyvernUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Green wyvern.
LanguageData.EggGreenWyvernFertilized.label: Green wyvern Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggGreenWyvernFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Green wyvern. If Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggBehirUnfertilized.label: Behir Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggBehirUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Behir. If Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggBehirFertilized.label: Behir Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggBehirFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Behir. If Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggLacosdileUnfertilized.label: Lacosdile Egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggLacosdileUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized egg of a Lacosdile. Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggLacosdileFertilized.label: Lacosdile Egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggLacosdileFertilized.description: A fertilized egg of a Lacosdile. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Baby Lacosdile. Eggs can be eaten raw, but are much better when cooked.
LanguageData.EggNightlingUnfertilized.label: Nightling egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggNightlingUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized Nightling egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggNightlingFertilized.label: Nightling egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggNightlingFertilized.description: Fertilized Nightling egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Nightling. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganUnfertilized.label: ptarmigan egg (Unfertilized)
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized ptarmigan egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganFertilized.label: ptarmigan egg (Fertilized)
LanguageData.EggPtarmiganFertilized.description: Fertilized ptarmigan egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
